original_text: How then will they call on him in whom they have not believed? And how are they to believe in him of whom they have never heard? And how are they to hear without someone preaching?
korean_text: 그런즉 그들이 믿지 아니하는 이를 어찌 부르리요 듣지도 못한 이를 어찌 믿으리요 전파하는 자가 없이 어찌 들으리요

sentences.original_text: How then will they call on him
in whom they have not believed?
sentences.korean_translation: 자기들이 믿지 않은 그 분을 말입니까

sentences.original_text: And how are they to believe in him
of whom they have never heard?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 들어본 적 없는 그 분을 말입니까

sentences.original_text: And how are they to hear without someone preaching?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 전파하는 사람이 없는데 어떻게 듣겠습니까?
